                                                              initially in the

                                                              before the

                                                            style="background-color: white; font-weight: normal;"
                                                            >Shape Of The Earth
                                                            Is Spherical</font

                                                        </h2>
                                                        <div wfd-id="603">
                                                          <font
                                                            face="inherit"
                                                            size="3"
                                                            style="background-color: white;"
                                                            ><font
                                                              >In early times,
                                                              people believed
                                                              that the earth
                                                              was&nbsp;</font
                                                            ><span wfd-id="153"
                                                              >flat. For
                                                              centuries, men
                                                              were afraid to
                                                              venture out too
                                                              far, for fear of
                                                              falling off the
                                                              edge! Sir
                                                              Francis&nbsp;</span
                                                            ><span wfd-id="152"
                                                              >Drake was the
                                                              first person who
                                                              proved that the
                                                              earth is spherical
                                                              when he sailed
                                                              around it in
                                                              1597.</span
                                                            ></font
                                                          >
                                                        </div>
                                                        <div wfd-id="116">
                                                          <div
                                                            style="font-size: medium; font-weight: 500;"
                                                            wfd-id="150"
                                                          >
                                                            <font
                                                              face="inherit"
                                                              style="background-color: white;"
                                                              >Consider the
                                                              following Qur’anic
                                                              verse regarding
                                                              the alternation of
                                                              day and
                                                              night:</font
                                                            >
                                                          </div>
                                                          <div
                                                            style="font-size: medium; font-weight: 500;"
                                                            wfd-id="150"
                                                          >
                                                            <span
                                                              style="background-color: white; font-family: inherit;"
                                                              wfd-id="616"
                                                              >“Seest thou not
                                                              that Allah merges
                                                              Night into Day and
                                                              He merges Day into
                                                              Night?”</span
                                                            >
                                                          </div>
                                                          <div
                                                            style="font-size: medium; font-weight: 500;"
                                                            wfd-id="146"
                                                          >
                                                            <div
                                                              style="background-color: white; color: black;"
                                                              wfd-id="147"
                                                            >
                                                              <span
                                                                style="background-color: #f4a900;"
                                                                wfd-id="148"
                                                                >[Al-Qur’an
                                                                31:29]</span
                                                              >
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div
                                                              style="background-color: white; color: black;"
                                                              wfd-id="147"
                                                            >
                                                              <font
                                                                face="inherit"
                                                                >Merging here
                                                                means that the
                                                                night slowly and
                                                                gradually
                                                                changes to day
                                                                and vice versa.
                                                                Merging is a
                                                                slow
                                                                process.</font
                                                              ><span
                                                                wfd-id="549"
                                                                >This phenomenon
                                                                can only take
                                                                place if the
                                                                earth is
                                                                spherical.&nbsp;</span
                                                              ><font
                                                                face="inherit"
                                                                >If the earth
                                                                was flat, there
                                                                would have been
                                                                a sudden change
                                                                from night to
                                                                day and from day
                                                                to night. So if
                                                                the earth was
                                                                flat then slow
                                                                merging would
                                                                not
                                                                possible.&nbsp;</font
                                                              ><span
                                                                wfd-id="548"
                                                                >This phenomenon
                                                                can only take
                                                                place if the
                                                                earth is
                                                                spherical.</span
                                                              >
                                                            </div>
                                                          </div>
                                                          <div
                                                            style="font-size: medium; font-weight: 500;"
                                                            wfd-id="143"

                                                                verse also
                                                                alludes to the
                                                                spherical shape

                                                                earth:</font

                                                                style="background-color: white;"
                                                                >The Arabic word
                                                                used here is
                                                                Kawwara meaning
                                                                ‘to overlap’ or
                                                                ‘to coil’– the
                                                                way a turban is
                                                                wound</font
                                                              >
                                                            </div>

                                                              style="font-size: medium; font-weight: 500;"

                                                                face="inherit"

                                                                >around the
                                                                head. The
                                                                overlapping or
                                                                coiling of the
                                                                day and night
                                                                can only take
                                                                place if the
                                                                earth is</font

                                                            </div>

                                                                face="inherit"
                                                                style="background-color: white;"
                                                                >spherical.</font
                                                              >
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div
                                                              style="font-size: medium; font-weight: 500;"
                                                              wfd-id="136"
                                                            >
                                                              <font
                                                                face="inherit"
                                                                style="background-color: white;"
                                                                >The earth is
                                                                not exactly
                                                                round like a
                                                                ball, but
                                                                Geo-spherical,
                                                                i.e. it is
                                                                flattened at the
                                                                poles. The
                                                                following verse
                                                                contains a
                                                                description of
                                                                the earth’s
                                                                shape:</font
                                                              >
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div
                                                              style="font-size: medium; font-weight: 500;"
                                                              wfd-id="136"
                                                            >
                                                              <span
                                                                style="background-color: white; font-family: inherit;"
                                                                wfd-id="598"
                                                                >“And the earth,
                                                                moreover, hath
                                                                He made egg
                                                                shaped.”</span
                                                              >
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div
                                                              style="color: black; font-size: medium; font-weight: 500;"
                                                              wfd-id="133"
                                                            >
                                                              <span
                                                                style="background-color: #f4a900;"
                                                                wfd-id="134"
                                                                >[Al-Qur’an
                                                                79:30]</span
                                                              >
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div
                                                              style="color: black; font-size: medium; font-weight: 500;"
                                                              wfd-id="133"

                                                              <span
                                                                style="background-color: #f4a900;"

                                                            <div
                                                              style="color: black; font-size: medium; font-weight: 500;"
                                                              wfd-id="133"
                                                            >
                                                              <span
                                                                style="background-color: white; font-family: inherit;"
                                                                wfd-id="592"
                                                                >The Arabic word
                                                                for egg here is
                                                                dahaahaa. One of
                                                                its meaning
                                                                is&nbsp; an
                                                                expanse but the
                                                                other meaning is
                                                                derived from the
                                                                arabic word
                                                                Duhiya which
                                                                means an egg.
                                                                Earth is not
                                                                completely round
                                                                like a boll. It
                                                                is flattened
                                                                from the poles
                                                                and bulzing from
                                                                the centre. It
                                                                is spherical in
                                                                shape. Dahaahaa
                                                                is referring an
                                                                ostrich-egg and
                                                                dahaahaa also
                                                                means where the
                                                                ostrich lays the
                                                                egg. The shape
                                                                of an
                                                                ostrich-egg
                                                                resembles the
                                                                geo-spherical
                                                                shape of the
                                                                earth.&nbsp;</span
                                                              >
                                                            </div>
                                                            <div
                                                              style="font-size: medium; font-weight: 500;"
                                                              wfd-id="132"

                                                                  style="background-color: white;"

                                                                  Qur’an
                                                                  correctly
                                                                  describes the
                                                                  shape of the
                                                                  earth, though
                                                                  the prevalent
                                                                  notion when
                                                                  the Qur’an was
                                                                  revealed was
                                                                  that the earth
                                                                  was

                                                                      >
                                                                        <font
                                                                          face="inherit"
                                                                          size="3"
                                                                          style="background-color: white;"
                                                                          >For a
                                                                          long
                                                                          time
                                                                          European
                                                                          philosophers
                                                                          and
                                                                          scientists
                                                                          believed
                                                                          that
                                                                          the
                                                                          earth
                                                                          stood
                                                                          still
                                                                          in the
                                                                          centre
                                                                          of the
                                                                          universe
                                                                          and
                                                                          every
                                                                          other
                                                                          body
                                                                          including
                                                                          the
                                                                          sun
                                                                          moved
                                                                          around
                                                                          it. In
                                                                          the
                                                                          West,
                                                                          this
                                                                          geocentric
                                                                          concept
                                                                          of the
                                                                          universe
                                                                          was
                                                                          prevalent
                                                                          right
                                                                          from
                                                                          the
                                                                          time
                                                                          of
                                                                          Ptolemy
                                                                          in the
                                                                          second
                                                                          century
                                                                          B.C.
                                                                          In
                                                                          1512,
                                                                          Nicholas
                                                                          Copernicus
                                                                          put
                                                                          forward
                                                                          his
                                                                          Heliocentric
                                                                          Theory
                                                                          of
                                                                          Planetary
                                                                          Motion,
                                                                          which
                                                                          asserted
                                                                          that
                                                                          the
                                                                          sun
                                                                          is&nbsp;motionless
                                                                          at the
                                                                          centre
                                                                          of the
                                                                          solar
                                                                          system
                                                                          with
                                                                          the
                                                                          planets
                                                                          revolving
                                                                          around
                                                                          it. In
                                                                          1609,
                                                                          the
                                                                          German
                                                                          scientist
                                                                          Yohannus
                                                                          Keppler
                                                                          published
                                                                          the
                                                                          ‘Astronomia
                                                                          Nova’.
                                                                          In
                                                                          this
                                                                          he
                                                                          concluded
                                                                          that
                                                                          not
                                                                          only
                                                                          do the
                                                                          planets
                                                                          move
                                                                          in
                                                                          elliptical
                                                                          orbits
                                                                          around
                                                                          the
                                                                          sun,
                                                                          they
                                                                          also
                                                                          rotate
                                                                          upon
                                                                          their
                                                                          axes
                                                                          at
                                                                          irregular
                                                                          speeds.
                                                                          With
                                                                          this
                                                                          knowledge
                                                                          it
                                                                          became
                                                                          possible
                                                                          for
                                                                          European
                                                                          scientists
                                                                          to
                                                                          explain
                                                                          correctly
                                                                          many
                                                                          of the
                                                                          mechanisms
                                                                          of the
                                                                          solar
                                                                          system,
                                                                          including
                                                                          the
                                                                          sequence
                                                                          of
                                                                          night
                                                                          and
                                                                          day.
                                                                          After
                                                                          these
                                                                          discoveries,
                                                                          it was
                                                                          thought
                                                                          that
                                                                          the
                                                                          Sun
                                                                          was
                                                                          stationary
                                                                          and
                                                                          did
                                                                          not
                                                                          rotate
                                                                          about
                                                                          its
                                                                          axis
                                                                          like
                                                                          the
                                                                          Earth.</font
                                                                        >
                                                                      </div>

                                                                        <font
                                                                          face="inherit"
                                                                          size="3"
                                                                          style="background-color: white;"
                                                                          >The
                                                                          Arabic
                                                                          word
                                                                          used
                                                                          in the
                                                                          above
                                                                          verse
                                                                          is
                                                                          yasbahoon
                                                                          . This
                                                                          word
                                                                          is
                                                                          derived
                                                                          from
                                                                          the
                                                                          word
                                                                          sabaha.
                                                                          It
                                                                          carries
                                                                          with
                                                                          it the
                                                                          idea
                                                                          of
                                                                          motion
                                                                          that
                                                                          comes
                                                                          from
                                                                          any
                                                                          moving
                                                                          body.
                                                                          If you
                                                                          use
                                                                          this
                                                                          word
                                                                          for a
                                                                          person
                                                                          on the
                                                                          ground,
                                                                          it
                                                                          would
                                                                          not
                                                                          mean
                                                                          that
                                                                          he is
                                                                          rolling
                                                                          but
                                                                          would
                                                                          imply
                                                                          that
                                                                          he is
                                                                          walking
                                                                          or&nbsp;running.
                                                                          If you
                                                                          use
                                                                          this
                                                                          word
                                                                          for a
                                                                          person
                                                                          in
                                                                          water,
                                                                          it
                                                                          would
                                                                          not
                                                                          mean
                                                                          that
                                                                          he is
                                                                          floating
                                                                          but
                                                                          would
                                                                          imply
                                                                          that
                                                                          he is
                                                                          swimming.
                                                                          Similarly,
                                                                          if you
                                                                          use
                                                                          the
                                                                          word
                                                                          yasbah
                                                                          for a
                                                                          celestial
                                                                          body
                                                                          such
                                                                          as the
                                                                          sun,
                                                                          it
                                                                          would
                                                                          not
                                                                          only
                                                                          mean
                                                                          that
                                                                          it is
                                                                          flying
                                                                          through
                                                                          space
                                                                          but
                                                                          would
                                                                          also
                                                                          mean
                                                                          that
                                                                          it is
                                                                          rotating
                                                                          as it
                                                                          goes
                                                                          through
                                                                          space.</font
                                                                        >

                                                                        <font
                                                                          face="inherit"
                                                                          size="3"
                                                                          style="background-color: white;"
                                                                          >The
                                                                          rotation
                                                                          of the
                                                                          sun
                                                                          about
                                                                          its
                                                                          own
                                                                          axis
                                                                          can be
                                                                          proved
                                                                          with
                                                                          the
                                                                          help
                                                                          of an
                                                                          equipment
                                                                          that
                                                                          projects
                                                                          the
                                                                          image
                                                                          of the
                                                                          sun on
                                                                          the
                                                                          top of
                                                                          a
                                                                          table,
                                                                          so
                                                                          that
                                                                          one
                                                                          can
                                                                          examine
                                                                          the
                                                                          image
                                                                          of the
                                                                          sun
                                                                          without
                                                                          being
                                                                          blinded.
                                                                          It is
                                                                          noticed
                                                                          that
                                                                          the
                                                                          sun
                                                                          has
                                                                          spots
                                                                          which
                                                                          complete
                                                                          a
                                                                          circular
                                                                          motion
                                                                          once
                                                                          every
                                                                          25
                                                                          days
                                                                          i.e.
                                                                          the
                                                                          sun
                                                                          takes
                                                                          approximately
                                                                          25
                                                                          days
                                                                          to
                                                                          rotate
                                                                          round
                                                                          its
                                                                          axis.
                                                                          The
                                                                          sun
                                                                          travels
                                                                          through
                                                                          space
                                                                          at
                                                                          roughly
                                                                          240 km
                                                                          per
                                                                          second,
                                                                          and
                                                                          takes
                                                                          about
                                                                          200
                                                                          million
                                                                          years
                                                                          to
                                                                          complete
                                                                          one
                                                                          revolution
                                                                          around
                                                                          the
                                                                          centre
                                                                          of our
                                                                          Milky
                                                                          Way
                                                                          Galaxy.</font
                                                                        >
                                                                      </div>

                                                                        <font
                                                                          face="inherit"
                                                                          size="3"
                                                                          style="background-color: white;"
                                                                          >In
                                                                          1580,
                                                                          Bernard
                                                                          Palissy
                                                                          was
                                                                          the
                                                                          first
                                                                          person
                                                                          to
                                                                          describe
                                                                          the
                                                                          present
                                                                          day
                                                                          concept
                                                                          of
                                                                          ‘water
                                                                          cycle’.
                                                                          He
                                                                          described
                                                                          how
                                                                          water
                                                                          evaporates
                                                                          from
                                                                          the
                                                                          oceans
                                                                          and
                                                                          cools
                                                                          to
                                                                          form
                                                                          clouds.
                                                                          The
                                                                          clouds
                                                                          move
                                                                          inland
                                                                          where
                                                                          they
                                                                          rise,
                                                                          condense
                                                                          and
                                                                          fall
                                                                          as
                                                                          rain.
                                                                          This
                                                                          water
                                                                          gathers
                                                                          as
                                                                          lakes
                                                                          and
                                                                          streams
                                                                          and
                                                                          flows
                                                                          back
                                                                          to the
                                                                          ocean
                                                                          in a
                                                                          continuous
                                                                          cycle.
                                                                          In the
                                                                          7th
                                                                          century
                                                                          B.C.,
                                                                          Thales
                                                                          of
                                                                          Miletus
                                                                          believed
                                                                          that
                                                                          surface
                                                                          spray
                                                                          of the
                                                                          oceans
                                                                          was
                                                                          picked
                                                                          up by
                                                                          the
                                                                          wind
                                                                          and
                                                                          carried
                                                                          inland
                                                                          to
                                                                          fall
                                                                          as
                                                                          rain.
                                                                          In
                                                                          earlier
                                                                          times
                                                                          people
                                                                          did
                                                                          not
                                                                          know
                                                                          the
                                                                          source
                                                                          of
                                                                          underground
                                                                          water.
                                                                          They
                                                                          thought
                                                                          the
                                                                          water
                                                                          of the
                                                                          oceans,
                                                                          under
                                                                          the
                                                                          effect
                                                                          of
                                                                          winds,
                                                                          was
                                                                          thrust
                                                                          towards
                                                                          the
                                                                          interior
                                                                          of the
                                                                          continents.
                                                                          They
                                                                          also
                                                                          believed
                                                                          that
                                                                          the
                                                                          water
                                                                          returned
                                                                          by a
                                                                          secret
                                                                          passage
                                                                          or the
                                                                          Great
                                                                          Abyss.
                                                                          This
                                                                          passage
                                                                          is
                                                                          connected
                                                                          to the
                                                                          oceans
                                                                          and
                                                                          has
                                                                          been
                                                                          called
                                                                          the
                                                                          ‘Tartarus’,
                                                                          since
                                                                          Plato’s
                                                                          time.
                                                                          Even
                                                                          Descartes,
                                                                          a
                                                                          great
                                                                          thinker
                                                                          of the
                                                                          eighteenth
                                                                          century,
                                                                          subscribed
                                                                          to
                                                                          this
                                                                          view.
                                                                          Till
                                                                          the
                                                                          nineteenth
                                                                          century,
                                                                          Aristotle’s
                                                                          theory
                                                                          was
                                                                          still
                                                                          prevalent.
                                                                          According
                                                                          to
                                                                          this
                                                                          theory,
                                                                          water
                                                                          was
                                                                          condensed
                                                                          in
                                                                          cool
                                                                          mountain
                                                                          caverns
                                                                          and
                                                                          formed
                                                                          underground
                                                                          lakes
                                                                          that
                                                                          fed
                                                                          springs.
                                                                          Today,
                                                                          we
                                                                          have
                                                                          come
                                                                          to
                                                                          know
                                                                          that
                                                                          the
                                                                          rainwater
                                                                          that
                                                                          seeps
                                                                          into
                                                                          the
                                                                          cracks
                                                                          of the
                                                                          ground
                                                                          is
                                                                          responsible
                                                                          for
                                                                          this.
                                                                          This
                                                                          is
                                                                          described
                                                                          by the
                                                                          Qur’an
                                                                          in the
                                                                          following
                                                                          verses:</font

                                                                          >In

                                                                          the
                                                                          phenomenon
                                                                          of
                                                                          ‘folding’,
                                                                          is a
                                                                          recently
                                                                          discovered
                                                                          fact.
                                                                          Folding
                                                                          is
                                                                          responsible
                                                                          for
                                                                          the
                                                                          formation
                                                                          of
                                                                          mountain
                                                                          ranges.
                                                                          The
                                                                          earth’s
                                                                          crust,
                                                                          on
                                                                          which
                                                                          we
                                                                          live,
                                                                          is
                                                                          like a
                                                                          solid
                                                                          shell,
                                                                          while
                                                                          the
                                                                          deeper
                                                                          layers
                                                                          are
                                                                          hot
                                                                          and
                                                                          fluid,
                                                                          and
                                                                          thus
                                                                          inhospitable
                                                                          to any
                                                                          form
                                                                          of
                                                                          life.
                                                                          It is
                                                                          also
                                                                          known
                                                                          that
                                                                          the
                                                                          stability
                                                                          of the
                                                                          mountains
                                                                          is
                                                                          linked
                                                                          to the
                                                                          phenomenon
                                                                          of
                                                                          folding,
                                                                          for it
                                                                          was
                                                                          the
                                                                          folds
                                                                          that
                                                                          were
                                                                          to
                                                                          provide
                                                                          foundations
                                                                          for
                                                                          the
                                                                          reliefs
                                                                          that
                                                                          constitute
                                                                          the
                                                                          mountains.</font
                                                                        >
                                                                      </div>
                                                                      <div
                                                                        wfd-id="124"
                                                                      >
                                                                        <font
                                                                          face="inherit"
                                                                          size="3"
                                                                          style="background-color: white;"
                                                                          >Geologists
                                                                          tell
                                                                          us
                                                                          that
                                                                          the
                                                                          radius
                                                                          of the
                                                                          Earth
                                                                          is
                                                                          about
                                                                          6,035
                                                                          km and
                                                                          the
                                                                          crust
                                                                          on
                                                                          which
                                                                          we
                                                                          live
                                                                          is
                                                                          very
                                                                          thin,
                                                                          ranging
                                                                          between
                                                                          2 to
                                                                          35 km.
                                                                          Since
                                                                          the
                                                                          crust
                                                                          is
                                                                          thin,
                                                                          it has
                                                                          a high
                                                                          possibility
                                                                          of
                                                                          shaking.
                                                                          Mountains
                                                                          act
                                                                          like
                                                                          stakes
                                                                          or
                                                                          tent
                                                                          pegs
                                                                          that
                                                                          hold
                                                                          the
                                                                          earth’s
                                                                          crust
                                                                          and
                                                                          give
                                                                          it
                                                                          stability.
                                                                          The
                                                                          Qur’an
                                                                          contains
                                                                          exactly
                                                                          such a
                                                                          description:</font
                                                                        >
